item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Martha Graham
item.description: "All that is important is this one moment in movement. Make the moment important, vital, and worth living. Do not let it slip away unnoticed and unused." -- Martha Graham

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Elisabeth Kübler-Ross
item.description: "People are like stained-glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within." -- Elisabeth Kübler-Ross

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Sheri Reynolds
item.description: "Energy is neither created nor destroyed. It just changes shape." -- Sheri Reynolds

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Holding anger is a poison...It eats you from inside...We think that by hating someone we hurt them...But hatred is a curved blade...and the harm we do to others...we also do to ourselves." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Life has to end, love doesn't." -- Mitch Albom
